issue.title: [C++] Create non-owned CudaContext from context handle provided by thirdparty user
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1423](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1423). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow-up work to ARROW-1364. This will enable Arrow to allocate device memory within an existing driver context rather than having to create its own separate context

comments.body:
